request.description:
Used to create office hours. Where body has the following parameters:  
  
courseId: int -> id of the course this office hour is being created for

startTime: timeObject converted to a string in the 24h format

endTime: timeObject converted to a string in the 24h format

recurringEvent: boolean -> true if the event is recurring

startDate: DateObj converted to a string

endDate: DateObj converted to a string

timeInterval: int -> intervals of time this office hour will have, in minutes

hosts: \[int\] -> array of integers holding the ids of the office hour hosts

daysOfWeek: \[string\] -> days in which this office hour will be held

location: string -> location of the office hour

Used to register for an office hour. Where body has the following params:

officeHourId: int -> id of the office hour this student is registering to

startTime: timeObject converted to a string in the 24h format

endTime: timeObject converted to a string in the 24h format

date: DateObj converted to a string

question: string -> question the student is looking for answers

TopicIds: \[int\] -> array of integers holding the ids of the topics

response.name: Register For office hour

request.description:
Cancels an office hour on a specific date:

officeHourId: int -> office hour that is being cancelled

date: DateObj converted to a string in the following format MM-DD-YYYY

response.name: Cancel OH on date

request.description:
officeHourId: int -> id of the office hour that is being deleted

date: DateObj converted to a string -> the date which we are deleting office hours up to that date. If the office hour has an end date that is later than the given date we don't delete the office hour but update it's starting date to be the new date object.  
  
All the registrations up to date will also be cancelled
gets the time slots for a given office hour

Updates the location and hours of an office hour on a specific date

startTime: TimeObj converted to a string in the following format HH:MM:SS

endTime: TimeObj converted to a string in the following format HH:MM:SS

location: string

response.name: edit all office hours

request.description: Cancels a registration with a specific id

response.name: Cancel Registration
